1.0.name: wordpress/wp-vip
1.0.description:
A powerful plugin Pay per download manager for wordpress

Features:

  • User management roles
  • The cost of credit for the role
  • Management users role
  • Add user to role
  • Management files role
  • Add file to role
  • Add user payment
  • Enable/disable vip user
  • Send download link for the user indirectly

Send email for Translation files: mst404[a]gmail[dot].com for translate, please open langs/default.po by Poedit and translate strings.
